categories.description:
An array of category strings corresponding to this area. This allows highlighting and filtering of areas.
By default, the label is used as the area category.

color.description: The area color. The default values come from the CSS classess and varies based on theme.

label.description: Text used for the area's label.

labelStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the area. The default values come from the CSS classess and varies based on theme.

location.description: An identifier corresponding to a Feature provided in the mapProvider geo object that this area is associated with.

selectable.description: Specifies whether or not the area will be selectable.

shortDesc.description: The text that displays in the area's tooltip.

svgClassName.description: The CSS style class defining the style of the area.

svgStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the area.
